Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Peptide 3 (Tritrpticin derived, synthetic AMPs, Trp-rich, UCLL1)
Sequence Information.Source: sequence truncation, cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (76.92%) toTritrpticinW: 30%, F=R=P: 20%.Activity: Zone inhibition assay: Active against E. coli, P. aeruginosa, K. pneumonia, S.epidermidis,  P.mirabilis,  and  Streptococcus  group  D. Poorly active against fungi A.fumigatus (MIC 500 ug/ml) and C.albicans (>1000 ug/ml).
Literature Information.Author: Lawyer C, Pai S, Watabe M, Borgia P, Mashimo T, Eagleton L, Watabe K. 1996
Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial activity of a 13 amino acid tryptophan-rich peptide derived from a putative porcine precursor protein of a novel family of antibacterial peptides.
